name: Single Strike Scroll of Piercing
rules: Attach a Pokémon Tool to 1 of your Pokémon that doesn't already have a Pokémon Tool attached.
The Single Strike Pokémon this card is attached to can use the attack on this card. (You still need the necessary Energy to use this attack.)
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

attacks.name: Bullet Breakthrough
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance, or by any effects on your opponent's Active Pokémon.
